name: Ability Score Increase
description: You can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1.

name: Grappler
description: You have advantage on attack rolls against a creature you are grappling.

name: Healer
description: You can use a healerâ€™s kit to stabilize a dying creature without a check. When you use a healer's kit to tend to a creature, the creature also regains 1 hit point.
